exercises.title: Clean Sprint
exercises.text: Start controlled. Hold a steady tempo. Let accuracy lead the run.

exercises.title: Targets
exercises.text: Targets: 95% accuracy, 50+ WPM, and fewer than 12 backspaces.

exercises.title: Work Notes
exercises.text: Notes: finalize the report by Monday; share updates by 11:30 AM; flag blockers early.

exercises.title: Tempo Hold
exercises.text: Hold pace. Don’t spike. Finish clean and controlled.

exercises.title: Dash Discipline
exercises.text: Speed is good, but clean entries win. Tighten spacing, then push.
